subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Basketball
College Athletics
Roommates
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Tina Stewart, a junior guard at Middle Tennessee State, was fatally stabbed in her apartment Wednesday night, and a roommate, Shanterrica Madden, 18, was charged with first-degree murder.
snippet: Tina Stewart, a junior guard at Middle Tennessee State, was fatally stabbed in her apartment Wednesday night, and a roommate, Shanterrica Madden, 18, was charged with first-degree murder.
